function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Propagation of economic shocks across different industries and geographical locations through GVCs","Impact":"Disruption of supply chains, leading to shortages of essential supplies","Mitigation":"Improving stability and resilience to shocks in GVCs, rethinking supply chain organization","Technologies":"Supply chain management technology, risk assessment tools","People":"Consumers, businesses, countries, regions","Owner":"Supply chain managers, policymakers, governments"},{"Description":"Shortage of facemasks","Impact":"Inadequate protection against contagious diseases, leading to increased transmission","Mitigation":"Ramping up production, diversifying suppliers","Technologies":"Manufacturing technology, supply chain management technology","People":"Countries in need, healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Manufacturers, governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Dependence on localized production for security of supply","Impact":"Limiting the scope for cushioning shocks, particularly those that may originate domestically","Mitigation":"Balancing localized production with global supply chains, building redundancy in supply chains","Technologies":"Supply chain management technology, risk assessment tools","People":"Consumers, businesses, countries","Owner":"Supply chain managers, policymakers, governments"}]}
